So with one debate under our belts, are you up for another one Skeptic?
 
 I propose we debate one of the following:
 
 "Birds evolved from dinosaurs"
 "The Earth's geology proves the Earth is billions of years old"
 "The Biblical global flood did not occur"
 "Young Earth Creationism is a disproven ideology"
 "Information can increase through evolution"
 
 I would support the afirmative in any of these.
 
 I am of course open to other ideas if you have a particular favourite.
